title: Cannot update react-native-swiper further than 1.5.10
body:
[comment]: # (Please replace ... with your information. Remove < and >)

### User Story

As a developer, I want to be able to update the react-native-swiper to new versions in order to benefit from future performance improvements/bug fixing without breaking the application
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: 
Currently using a version of the react-native-swiper more recent than 1.5.10 gets you a white screen when you change to another tab in the main view after logging in.

Main screen works
![screenshot_1506100359](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1181225/30756395-d8024f6e-9fca-11e7-9211-ea110f8abc8d.png)

Then tab gives this
![screenshot_1506100363](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1181225/30756398-d9a2da82-9fca-11e7-87ea-828b8dd7a7b2.png)


### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

Developer side:
- update react-native-swipper to 1.5.11 in package.json

Tester side:
- Open Status
- Log in
- Go to another tab
- Should show the tab and not a white screen

### Solution
[comment]: # (Please summarise the solution and provide a task list on what needs to be fixed.)
*Summary*: 

- [ ] reproduce on iOS to see if there is similar problem and maybe more detailed logs on the error

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: develop
[comment]: # (Android or iOS.)
* Operating System: Android

#### Logs
```
09-22 19:12:39.253  3388  3432 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:22] - Handling re-frame event:  :navigate-to-tab
09-22 19:12:39.267  3388  3432 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:22] - Handling re-frame event:  :update-wallet
09-22 19:12:39.282  3388  3432 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:22] - Handling re-frame event:  :update-balance-fail
09-22 19:12:39.282  3388  3432 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.ui.screens.wallet.events:114] - Unable to get balance:  Error: can't fetch trie key 7f72b9a54d0cc314b0e2e584a4cb93e08e1380af86f2ca85ee325346fb8df8f6: no suitable peers available
09-22 19:12:39.343  3388  3432 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:22] - Handling re-frame event:  :navigate-to-tab
09-22 19:12:39.403  3388  3388 W ViewPager: Requested offscreen page limit 0 too small; defaulting to 1
```
